Summary: I can't get any better than this...
text: I used to pay $15 or more at Lassen's  for a 14 ounce jar of this same brand of coconut oil. I can't believe I pay only $21 for 54 ounces of it. I use this oil not only for cooking everyday but also I rub it in my skin and I  use it in my hair..I even get compliments in the way my skin looks or the way I smell too..It's totally amazing! Don't forget the health benefits of it too..It doesn't hurt to  burn some extra fat..I highly recommend this product! I love this coconut oil!!!:)
